AdministrationBuilding.text: Pass a Will (-1) check to get the Dean to offer you a retainer to write a manuscript for the college. Gain a Retainer card.

ScienceBuilding.text: An archaelogy professor shows you an item he recovered in an Egyptian pyramid. If you have 2 or fewer Spells, it glows in your hands and you find yourself outisde, still holding it. Not wanting to confront the professor again, you decide to keep it. Gain 1 Unique Item and move to the street. If you have more than 2 Spells, nothing happens.

Library.text: You find an unusual book that radiates evil at the touch. You begin to read and are drawn into it. Make a Lore (-2) check. If you pass, you obtain vast knowldege of the eldritch threat. Roll a die and gain that many Clue tokens. If you fail, the book consumes you - mind and soul - lose 2 Sanity and 2 Stamina.
